comments:

Created an attachment (id=52911)
The mentioned project

Your gmfgraph model is not valid; run validation over Canvas 'leonardo2' and 
fix errors (set figure for diagram label).

GMF FIX: warn user if gmfgraph model is not valid before generating gmfmap 
model.
